Bingo Card Book Recommendations

Bingo Card All Books

Family Matters

Bingo Square [25]

A book that features biological family ties. Sisters, brothers, mothers, fathers, grandparents, and children – as long as the relationship plays a part, it’s welcome for this square. HARD MODE: Features at least three generations in a single family.
